segments.text: Where can I find information on this subject ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm not sure . Let's look up the catalogue .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Will you give some advice on this experiment ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I advise that step be taken in power supply first .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What's his suggestion for this work ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: His suggestion is that the work be started at once .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The way I see it is that they'd join us .
segments.speaker: S1
